snippet.title: The Coldest Winter - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Guide Jovanna on a psychological horror journey through a freezing New York City. Navigate the emotional states of unstable characters and uncover the truth behind the unnatural weather in this unique narrative experience. Check out the trailer for The Coldest Winter to meet Jovanna and get a peek at this upcoming game. The Coldest Winter will be available on PC.
